Visible.description: Set the visibility of the button.

OnPress.description: Action or rule to be performed when the event is triggered.

TextAlignment.description: [Deprecated. Use `Alignment` instead.] Text alignment of the button

Alignment.description: Content of alignment of the button, will be ignored if layout type is horizontal

Title.description: Label to be displayed on the button. For Android, the text is always in upper case and cannot be styled to contain lower case letters.

enum.description: Less emphasis but still require users's attention.
Less important actions users can take.

ButtonType.description: The important types of the button.

enum.description: Use it for neutral actions, e.g. Back / Cancel.
Use it for positive actions, e.g. Update / Add / Approve.
Use it for negative actions, e.g. Delete / Reset / Reject.

Semantic.description: Use the semantic buttons for positive and negative actions.

Image.description: The image to be displayed along with the title.

ImagePosition.description: Position of the image to be displayed along with the title

ImageSize.description: Size of the image to be displayed along with the title

FullWidth.description: Sets the full width of the button, will be ignored if layout type is horizontal

Style.description: [Deprecated. Use `Styles` instead.] The string value is a [style class](../../../Styles/ButtonClass.style.md) name of `Button`.

Image.description: The string value is a style class name of `Image`.

Button.description: The string value is a style class name of `Button`.

Enabled.description: Sets the button as enabled or disabled.
